actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish a John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program to advance the development of public policy with respect to issues affecting senior citizens.

summary.text: John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program - Establishes a John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program to encourage the identification and training of new leadership in issues affecting senior citizens and to advance the development of public policy with respect to such issues. Authorizes the Heinz Family Foundation to select fellowship participants. Limits the number of fellowships to two and provides for placement of participants in positions in the Senate that are supportive of their areas of expertise. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program to advance the development of public policy with respect to issues affecting senior citizens.
